Directions: In a mixing bowl, beat the buttermilk and pudding mix on medium speed for 1 minute. let stand for 5 minutes. Fold in the fruit cocktail, oranges, marshmallows and whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving.
Ingredients: 1 (5.1 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) carton frozen whipped topping, thawed
